HotelElement.Name: Quality Hotel Tiffins On The Park

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Quality Hotel Tiffins On The Park in Adelaide, you'll be convenient to Himeji Gardens and Adelaide Central Market. This 4-star motel is within close proximity of Osmond Gardens and Kurrangga Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 54 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and complimentary weekday newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite massages and facials. This motel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and wedding services.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the motel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. This motel has 3 meeting rooms available for events. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the motel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Himeji Gardens - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Osmond Gardens - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Kurrangga Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Quality Hotel Tiffins On The Park is Adelaide, SA (ADL) - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
